name: Microsoft Architecture Center
description: Best practices and patterns for building applications on Microsoft Azure. Also provides suggestions for architecting solutions on Azure by using established patterns and practices.

name: AWS Architecture Center
description: Get Started Architecting on AWS. It provides reference architecture diagrams, vetted architecture solutions, Well-Architected best practices, patterns, icons, and more.

name: Google Cloud Architecture Center
description: Discover reference architectures, guidance, and best practices for building or migrating your workloads on Google Cloud.
